title: Top Places to visit in Paschim Medinipur, Midnapore, West Bengal
content: Paschim Medinipur district (পশ্চিম মেদিনীপুর জেলা) or West Midnapore district (also known as Midnapore West) is one of the districts of the state of West Bengal, India. It was formed on 1 January 2002 after the Partition of Midnapore into Paschim Medinipur and Purba Medinipur. On 4 April 2017, th
